mapper.select: select time,value from T_MAIN_XYZ where orgno=#{selectArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and element_name='主站—配网设备协调度'
select time,value from T_MAIN_XYZ where orgno=#{selectArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and element_name='终端—配网设备匹配度'
select time,value from T_MAIN_XYZ where orgno=#{selectArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and element_name='网架—通信协调度'
select time,value from T_MAIN_XYZ where orgno=#{selectArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and element_name='配网设备重要性与终端类型匹配度'
